actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for addition to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial of the site of the salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition.

summary.text: Adds the site of the salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition while encamped at Fort Clatsop, Oregon, to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial. Limits the size of the designated site to 130 acres.

titles.title: A bill to provide for addition to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial of the site of the salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition.
